definitions: the abrupt or violent removal of a group of people from an organization or place

examples.text: the purging of middle management in the recession was a seriously flawed strategy

shortDefinitions: abrupt removal of group considered undesirable

examples.text: purging of stem cell transplants may become routine to reduce contamination

definitions: the expulsion of food from the body by self-induced vomiting or the use of laxatives

examples.text: these acts of binging and purging are usually kept secret and may go undetected for years
